caption.p: Spatial and temporal expression and activity of MAPK-1 and MAPK in contrasting wheat cultivars under HS at different stages of growth, (a) Expression of MAPK-1 under differential HS, (b) Activity of MAPK under differential HS; HD3086 and BT-Schomburgk were used for the analysis; activity of the MAPK protein was carried out using ADP-Gloâ„¢ Kinase assay kit (Promega, USA), vertical bars indicate s.e (n = 3).
